newsitem.title: GERMANY: Results of Bundesbank poll, October 22.
newsitem.headline: Results of Bundesbank poll, October 22.

text.p: Following are the results of a poll of 10 economists on the expected outcome of this week's Bundesbank council meeting. The poll was conducted on Tuesday.
1. Will the Bundesbank cut its leading interest rates this week?
Yes 0
No 10
2. Will there be a further cut in the discount and lombard rates later this year?
Yes 0
No 10
3. Will there be another fixed tender at 3.00 this Thursday?
Yes 10
No 0
Detailed results of the poll as follows:
Economist 1. 2. 3.
Stefan Schneider, Banque Paribas No. No. Yes.
Ulrich Humbrecher, WestLB No. No. Yes.
Ulrich Beckmann, Deutsche Bank No. No. Yes.
Wilfried Bock, Norddt. Landesbank No. No. Yes.
Steven King, HSBC James Capel No. No. Yes.
Stephen Lewis, London Bond Broking No. No. Yes.
Howard Archer, Nat West Bank No. No. Yes.
Ros Lifton, HSBC Markets No. No. Yes.
Craig Shute, Bear Sterns No. No. Yes.
Sharda Persaud, San Paolo Bank No. No. Yes.
--Frankfurt Newsroom + 49 69 756525
